Class Board

java.lang.Object
com.example.battleship.model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
Board class representing the game board and managing the state of the Battleship game. Handles ship placement, validation, state changes, and win condition checks.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    static enum 
    Board.State
    Enum representing the state of a cell on the game board.
